comment: Smokey but not harsh. Lovely flavour.
Kind of Caol Ila and Kilchoman mixed together
Frisk sjø. Litt mer fan av cask strength, men denne er også virkelig god.

Cijfer: 7,5
Proefnotities:
Goed prijs/kwaliteit. Licht rokerig, genoeg om een lekkere roes te bewerkstelligen
Licht medicinaal
Soort Ardbeg light
A good intro for non-Islay drinkers. The beginning is sweet and smooth, with a peppery spice introducing itself in the middle, and finished with a smoky peat at the end
Great value for money. Though not exactly delicate, it's far from overwhelming. A nice balance of flavors.. Great for any situation
loved this - reminiscent of laphroaig and ardbeg in the smokiness category, not quite as full in the mouth

I've not had the 40% expression but the cask strength has a nice flavors profile. Still missing that fullness in the middle to tie it in but not bad. Seasoned wood smoke, sweet, slight cherry and citrus. Alcohol comes in at the end.

Another sample from my Christmas gift set. Interesting nose. Malty, with dried cherries, cherry syrup, and some smoke. Slightly sweet palate at the beginning, leading to a rapid, hot, smoky finish. Surprisingly hot given the low ABV. I would compare this to decaffeinated coffee: missing a certain roundness in the middle. The flavor does not match the nose. 

I give it a C-, 70 points, a scant 3 stars.
Vanilla and oak mixed with smoke and sea salt. Hints of oranges and chocolate
very drinkable and smooth.. a little spicy but sweet on the other side...
Picked this up in a tiny little village in northern Germany.  Not overly impressed, the peat is quite subdued and not in the standard sense you get from aged barrels.  No real impact
I like how this one starts and delivers on the peat but the finish has too much burn for my liking
I love this whiskey. It's inbetween Islay and the mainland. Inbetween smooth and rough.  Great mouthfeel, taste and finish.

Cask strenght 58%
God røg
Kan godt klare et par dråber vand
Too much peat for my taste

Surprisingly soft. Despite a strong peat aroma it hits the tongue sweet and and follows through with a little pepper spice and then following with peat.  The overall flavor is quick and doesn't linger much. If you're trying to love peat this may be a good intro.
Great flavours for a good price. Fron soft and sweet to peaty
Aards en ziltig met een licht zoete afdronk
Rather peaty with a slight sharpness but still somewhat round. Delicious!
BBQ potato chips and not much else to speak of.

Nose 👃; Phenols, peat, some light sweet fruit,
Taste 👅 ; Smoke, phenols, peat, spicy pepper,
Finish : Quite sharp, with a light vanilla, almost bourbon finish,
Excellent smoked ham/deli meats with smokey peat. Bland peppery smoke palate but finish too short and lacks heartwarming.
Peaty, smoky, then sweet with a spicy finish
zachtr zoete geur. medicenaal. licht rokering zachte whisky. smaakt zacht zoals ie ruikt.
